client.filters.credit_clear 源代码

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
"""
@File        : credit_clear.py
@Author      : wst
@Time        : 2022/3/15 上午9:21
@Description : 清分相关的过滤器
"""

from django_filters import rest_framework as filters

from client.models.credit_certificate import CreditClear



[文档]class CreditClearUndoFilter(filters.FilterSet):
    """ 清分管理-未清分 过滤器"""
    number = filters.CharFilter(field_name="credit_certificate__number", lookup_expr="icontains")
    start_date = filters.DateFilter(field_name="credit_certificate__promise_pay_at", lookup_expr="gte")
    end_date = filters.DateFilter(field_name="credit_certificate__promise_pay_at", lookup_expr="lte")


[文档]    class Meta:
        model = CreditClear
        fields = ['number', 'start_date', 'end_date']




[文档]class CreditClearDoneFilter(CreditClearUndoFilter):
    """ 清分管理-已清分 过滤器"""
    pass
